      • score

        public int score()
        Return the score of blackjack A could be 1 or 11, thus there are multiple possible scores for a blackjack hand, We return to return the highest that is under 21
        Overrides:
        score in class Player<BlackJackCard>
        Returns:
        score Be careful, we need to calculate the scores every time other than just add the last card, because every time ace can act as 1 or 11.
